alert.note: Alert for Archuleta; La Plata (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 3:23PM MDT until June 19 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Junction has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Archuleta County in southwestern Colorado... Southeastern La Plata County in southwestern Colorado... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 323 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Ignacio, or 10 miles southeast of Durango, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ignacio and Bayfield. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 550 in Colorado between mile markers 4 and 16. U.S. Highway 160 in Colorado between mile markers 86 and 111. Colorado 151 between mile markers 1 and 9. Colorado 172 between mile markers 4 and 24. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
